name: Collapse (itch) (MoonRising)
description:
Collapse is a survival horror/third-person shooter game where you have to discover what happened to the protagonist and her family.

**Attention: This is a college project made by a group called MoonRising, because of that the fate of the project is unknown**

MoonRising Team:

Gerson Bello - Programmer and Producer

Jorge Dohms - 3D Asset Creator

Lucas Bertasso - 3D Character Creator / Writer

Luccas Gevaerd - 3D Asset Creator / Level Designer

Nicholas Augusto - 3D Character Creator
